text: Łukasz Zejdler (born March 22, 1992 in Racibórz) is a Polish professional footballer who plays as a left back for Widzew Łódź in the II liga. ==Career== ===Club=== He is trainee of Unia Racibórz. He made his debut in Gambrinus liga for FC Baník Ostrava on 14 March 2011.W Polsce grał tylko w IV lidze, teraz jest w Baniku Ostrawa 16.03.2011, sports.pl On 2 August 2012, he moved to the Polish I liga side KS Cracovia on a loan deal. ===International=== He is a part of Poland national under-19 football team.Zejdler ponownie zagrał cały mecz 26.05.2011, nowiny.pl == References == ==External links== * * * Category:Living people Category:1992 births Category:Polish footballers Category:Ekstraklasa players Category:I liga players Category:Czech First League players Category:KS Cracovia players Category:FC Baník Ostrava players Category:GKS Katowice players Category:Chrobry Głogów players Category:Widzew Łódź players Category:Polish expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in the Czech Republic Category:People from Racibórz Category:Sportspeople from Silesian Voivodeship Category:Association football defenders
title: Łukasz Zejdler
